list.name: Chamber
list.query: show tag values from temperature with key = chamber

list.name: desiredTemperature
list.query: show tag values from temperature with key = desiredTemperature

list.name: driftTemperature
list.query: show tag values from temperature with key = driftTemperature

list.name: driftHumidity
list.query: show tag values from humidity with key = driftHumidity

list.name: copy_of_desiredHumidity
list.query: show tag values from humidity with key = desiredHumidity

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "measurement" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "humidity" WHERE "location" = 'internal' AND "sensor" = 'sensor1' AND "value" < 105 AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value")  *9/5 + 32 FROM "temperature" WHERE "area" = 'internal' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "humidity" WHERE "location" = 'internal' AND $timeFilter AND "value" < 105 GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "humidity" WHERE "location" = 'external' AND $timeFilter AND "value" < 105 GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value")  *9/5 + 32 FROM "temperature" WHERE "area" = 'internal' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "humidity" WHERE "location" = 'internal' AND "sensor" = 'sensor1' AND "value" < 105 AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "humidity" WHERE "location" = 'external' AND "sensor" = 'sensor1' AND "value" < 105 AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value")  *9/5 + 32 FROM "temperature" WHERE "area" = 'internal' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value")  *9/5 + 32 FROM "temperature" WHERE "area" = 'internal' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
